mapper.select: SELECT t2.id as "id" ,t2.account as "account" ,t2.name as "name" ,t2.leadership as "leadership" ,t2.level as "level" ,t2.email as "email" from org_org_vs_staff t1 inner join org_staff t2 on (t1.staff_id=t2.id and t2.del_flag=0) where t1.org_id=#{orgId} and t2.level=#{level}

SELECT t2.id as "id" ,t2.account as "account" ,t2.name as "name" ,t2.leadership as "leadership" ,t2.level as "level" from org_org_vs_staff t1 inner join org_staff t2 on (t1.staff_id=t2.id and t2.del_flag=0) inner join org_info t3 on (t1.org_id=t3.id and t3.del_flag=0) where t3.code=#{code} and t2.level=#{level}

select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t2.level) from org_org_vs_staff t1 inner join org_staff t2 on t1.staff_id=t2.id and t2.del_flag=0 inner join org_info t3 on (t1.org_id=t3.id and t3.del_flag=0) where t3.code=#{code}
